quote: “If we believe in nothing, if nothing has any meaning and if we can affirm no values whatsoever, then everything is possible and nothing has any importance.”
author: ― Albert Camus, The Rebel

quote: “Why do we argue? Life's so fragile, a successful virus clinging to a speck of mud, suspended in endless nothing.”
author: ― Alan Moore, Watchmen

quote: “The point is there ain't no point.”
author: ― Cormac McCarthy, No Country for Old Men

quote: “That's how we stay young these days: murder and suicide.”
author: ― Eugène Ionesco, Man With Bags

quote: “I think we are just insects, we live a bit and then die and that’s the lot. There’s no mercy in things. There’s not even a Great Beyond. There’s nothing.”
author: ― John Fowles, The Collector

quote: “I look up to heaven only when I want to sneeze.”
author: ― Ivan Turgenev, Fathers and Sons

quote: “Everything in the world displeases me: but, above all, my displeasure in everything displeases me.”
author: ― Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: “Nobody realizes that some people expend tremendous energy merely to be normal.”
author: ― Albert Camus

quote: “What can be broken, should be broken.”
author: ― Dmitry Pisarev

quote: “The surest way to corrupt a youth is to instruct him to hold in higher esteem those who think alike than those who think differently.”
author: ― Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: “The point is there ain’t no point.”
author: ― Cormac McCarthy

quote: “There is no one as dangerous as he or she who has nothing to lose.”
author: ― Rebecca Solnit

quote: “Do. Or do not. There is no try.”
author: ― Yoda

quote: “Say what you want about the deaf.”
author: ― Jimmy Carr

quote: “To think is to say no.”
author: ― Emile Chartier

quote: “One cannot be a part-time nihilist.”
author: ― Albert Camus

quote: “Nihilism is best done by professionals.”
author: ― Iggy Pop

quote: “To live is to suffer, to survive is to find some meaning in the suffering.”
author: ― Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: “I'd rather be hated for who I am, than loved for who I am not.”
author: ― Kurt Cobain

quote: “Nobody dies a virgin. Life fucks us all.”
author: ― Kurt Cobain

quote: “Practice makes perfect, but nobody's perfect, so why practice?”
author: ― Kurt Cobain

quote: “I am not gay, although I wish I were, just to piss off homophobes.”
author: ― Kurt Cobain

quote: “Rather be dead then cool.”
author: ― Kurt Cobain

quote: “We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.”
author: ― Oscar Wilde, Lady Windermere's Fan

quote: “I'm a pessimist because of intelligence, but an optimist because of will.”
author: ― Antonio Gramsci
